slides.name: Analysis
listItems: Goals and Objectives of the project are formulated
Terms and Cost of development are determined
Analysis and formulation of Customer Requirements
Technical goals are formed and signed

slides.name: Design
listItems: Choice of Technologies and Programming Language
The most suitable DBMS is determined

slides.name: Development
listItems: Development using various technologies and programming languages
Creation of a prototype and working version of the product

slides.name: Testing
listItems: Checking the Product for Compliance with the requirements and needs of the Customer
Finding and Registering bugs and defects
